Get index
item.description: Get index # Returns information about one or more indices Examples # Get the information of all indices: GET /_index Get the information of the index named my-index under collection my-collection: GET /my-collection/_index/my-index Request # GET /_index GET /<target>/_index GET /<target>/_index/<index> Path Parameters # target (Required, String) Comma-separated, names of the collections to specify (wildcard supported) index (Required, String) Comma-separated, names of the indices to get (wildcard supported)

item.title: Get index alias
item.description: Get index alias # Returns alias information about one or more indices under the specified collection.
